The Triad Gaming Commission's Weekly* Raffles

27
Ordim
Friday, September 15th, 2017, 9:27:20 PM

The Triad Gaming Commission of Solhaven has authorized the following raffle structure for immediate purchase- 100 total tickets will be sold for 10,000 silvers each. There is no limit to the number of tickets an individual can purchase. Each ticket will have a number from 1-100 on them. Each ticket sold will be in sequential order as available. If you buy a block of 10, you will have the next ten numbers available in sequential order.

Payments must be made to Ordim in game who will provide your numbers to you and document their purchase. As soon as one of two conditions occurs the raffle will be drawn - All 100 tickets are sold, the raffle drawing will be announced and scheduled for the next 9pm eastern time available. A week from the start of the raffle, ending at 9pm on the day of the start. (If the first sells out by Sunday, and a new one starts, that raffle will pull when all tickets are sold, or at 9pm of the following Sunday)

Raffle draws will be conducted by a public third-party service. Names of those who bought tickets will not be revealed and it will only draw and present the winning number. That number will be cross-referenced with the Commissions records and the winner contacted and the payout delivered. The "drawing" will be publicly held in Solhaven North Market (room 1438) and the results URL posted here and given to the group currently presented. There will be a "ceremony" inside the game.

Payouts will be 80% to the winner and 20% kept by the commission to be used for funds for future gaming options and hopefully the official MHO endowment if/when the group is confirmed. There will be more official IC postings related to the MHO group in the future including what we hope to be a popular event for most shortly after the group is made official.

TL:DR - The Jester's Gambit raffle

Contact Ordim in game for purchases

Completed Raffles - Rat Raffle Tickets are 25k each Prize is a red-eyed brown rat up to 100 unique players can buy up to 10 tickets each.
